1] with return_type with parameters

#include<stdio.h>
int sum(int a,int b){
    return a + b;
}
int main(){
    printf("Total : %d",sum(30,40));
    
    return 0;
}

2] with_out return_type with parameters

#include<stdio.h>
void sum(int a,int b){
    printf("Total : %d\n",a+b);
}
int main(){
    sum(10,20);
    sum(100,200);
    
    return 0;
}

3] with return_type with_out parameters

#include<stdio.h>
int sum(){
    int a = 10,b = 20;
    return a + b;
}
int main(){
    printf("Total : %d",sum());
    
    return 0;
}

4] with_out return_type with_out parameters

#include<stdio.h>
void sum(){
    int a = 10,b = 20;
    printf("Total : %d",a + b);
}
int main(){
    sum();
    
    return 0 ;
}

Recursive Function :

1] 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 5.....+ n
